summary: This document is an email chain from July 10, 2019, in which a Business Insider reporter, Benjamin Goggin, attempts to contact an individual involved in the Jeffrey Epstein prosecution for comment on a story. The recipient forwards the request to colleagues, noting the reporter contacted a personal email and that some questions (like about a photo) are not applicable. The email reveals media inquiry into potential conflicts of interest and background of a prosecutor.

persons.name: Benjamin Goggin
persons.context: Weekend Editor for Business Insider who is writing a story about an individual's participation in the Jeffrey Epstein prosecution and sends a list of questions via email.

events.title: Business Insider Requests Comment on Epstein Prosecutor
events.description: Reporter Benjamin Goggin emails an individual involved in the Jeffrey Epstein prosecution with questions about their role, potential conflicts of interest, personal background, and past legal work.

keyFacts: A Business Insider reporter is investigating an individual involved in the Jeffrey Epstein prosecution in July 2019.
The reporter's questions suggest scrutiny of the individual's potential conflicts of interest, citing their father, political donations, and attendance at the Women's March.
The reporter asks about the individual's work at the law firm Debevoise & Plimpton LLP and a prior 2016 case involving a camp counselor.
The email recipient indicates the reporter contacted a personal email account outside of proper channels.
The recipient notes a photo referenced in the questions is not of them.
